item.title: Amazon MemoryDB for Redis
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://aws.amazon.com/security/security-bulletins/AWS-2021-006/ Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL Amazon MemoryDB for Redis completed patching the Apache Log4j2 issue Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-16 15:34:24 NCSC-NL Updated vendorPatchExists. Updated community link source. Updated community note.

item.title: Amazon OpenSearch
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Apache Log4j2 Security Bulletin (CVE-2021-44228) (amazon.com) https://aws.amazon.com/security/security-bulletins/AWS-2021-005/ Community Resources Resource Link source https://aws.amazon.com/security/security-bulletins/AWS-2021-006/ Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL Update released, customers need to update their clusters to the fixed release Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-15 15:48:43 NCSC-NL Updated vendorPatchExists.

item.title: Amazon RDS
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://aws.amazon.com/security/security-bulletins/AWS-2021-006/ Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL Update in progress, portion of customers may still be vulnerable. Amazon RDS and Amazon Aurora are actively addressing all service usage of Log4j2 by applying updates Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-16 15:34:24 NCSC-NL Updated vendorPatchExists.

item.title: Amazon RDS for Oracle
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://aws.amazon.com/security/security-bulletins/AWS-2021-006/ Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL Amazon RDS Oracle has updated the version of Log4j2 in use within the service Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-16 15:34:24 NCSC-NL Updated vendorPatchExists. Updated community link source. Updated community note.

item.title: Amazon Simple Notification Service (SNS)
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://aws.amazon.com/security/security-bulletins/AWS-2021-006/ Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL Systems that serve customer traffic are patched against the Log4j2 issue. Working to apply the patch to sub-systems that operate separately from SNSâ€™s systems that serve customer traffic. Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-16 15:34:24 NCSC-NL Updated vendorPatchExists.

item.title: Amazon WorkSpaces/AppStream 2.0
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://aws.amazon.com/security/security-bulletins/AWS-2021-006/ Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL Not affected by CVE-2021-44228 with default configurations. WorkDocs Sync client versions 1.2.895.1 and older within Windows WorkSpaces, which contain the Log4j component, are vulnerable; For update instruction, see source for more info Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-16 15:34:24 NCSC-NL Updated vendorPatchExists.
